msbt.message: Ah yes. Thank you so much for returning that item to our friend .
Oh, you finally returned that item to , didn't you?What a weight off my chest. Thank you!
Can I ask you a question? What did say about it, if anything?
I'll tell you...
I don't remember.
So tell me—how did it go with , anyway?
Well, um, you see...
I, uh, don't remember.
You don't remember? Hmm, that's oddWell, as long as wasn't angry, I suppose all's well.
Wait, you opened it up yourself?After I spent so much time wrapping it nicely Where did you learn manners like that, ?!
What?! You opened it? Why would you open something addressed to someone else, ?! Well, all I can do is hope it's not the sort of thing that would offend . But, darling, I expect better from you!
Whew! I'm glad she wasn't annoyed by how long I held onto it. Well, thanks for running that little errand for me, !
I knew she'd just brush it off. That's SO her.And thank you for helping me out. That's SO you!
She wasn't angry? That's out of character Maybe your presence helped calm her down. Anyway, thank you so much for helping me out, .
Oh, good. I had a feeling that she'd probably just laugh it off.Well, I'm glad that's that. And thank you again for helping me out, .
He wasn't angry, was he? <10_4 />I'm just kidding. It's not like he missed out on a nap or anything. Well, I'm glad that's over with. Thanks again for your help, .
Oh, I'm glad he wasn't angry. I'm sure he would have let you know if he was. Well, it seems it's to the rescue once again. Thank you so much, !
Whew! I was certain he'd be furious with me for keeping it for so long. I suppose he can be reasonable. Thanks again for delivering it for me, . You really helped me out, .
So if he wasn't angry, what was his reaction? You never know with him Never mind—it's not important. All that matters is that I don't have to think about it anymore. So, thank you for that, .
Ah yes. Thank you so much for returning that item to for me.
How did it go with when you returned the item? Never mindI don't care that much. I was just chitchatting. Thanks again for your help!
Tell me, was very concerned? Anything I should know about?
I'll tell you...
Uh, I forgot.
So, did have anything to say when you returned that item?
So, um, actually...
I can't remember...
Youforgot?! How is that possible?You did remember to return the item, right?<10_4 /> , this is out of my hands now.
Wait You opened it?!<10_4 /> I'm terribly disappointed to hear that, .

Are you serious? I went to all the trouble of wrapping it up nicely, and you went and opened it? I can only hope it's not the sort of thing that would upset . Ugh. I'm not going to lie I'm disappointed with you, .
Oh noI knew I should have returned it earlier. Who goes out and buys a replacement so soon? Well, I've made a mess of this, haven't I, ?
You see? I knew I could get this all patched up without a problem, . Of course, I had a little help. Thanks again, .
Oh, that's right. Well, thank you so much for delivering that package to for me!
You delivered the package to as asked, right?Oh, thank you! You're a real lifesaver, !
Well? must have been excited to get a package. Anything to report?
I'll tell you about it...
I don't remember.
So? What did say when you delivered my package?
So, the thing is...
I...don't remember...
I see. Well, I suppose that's the end of that, then.I'm sure your quick delivery helped smooth over the situation, so thank you for that!
Waitdid you just say that you unwrapped that package before delivering it? Who does that?! You can't just open someone else's mail! And I wrapped it so nicely too
What?! You opened up a package meant for someone else?I can only hope it's not the sort of thing would find distressing! Though I certainly DO, !
Wait, so you're saying that package was meant to be a gift for you all along?! Oh dear. I seem to have made things unnecessarily complicated
Good. I'm glad the package finally made it to where it was meant to be. Thank you for helping, .
Well, thank you so much for delivering that little gift to for me.
So? What was the reaction?
Well, it's like this...
I don't remember.
So? How was the gift received?
About that...
I...don't remember.
How can you not remember? Did you close your eyes and plug your ears? This is going to bother me all day! Ugh, I suppose I'll have to go ask for myself, .
Waityou actually opened it?! What were you thinking?Do you understand how gifts work? Did you notice the incredibly detailed wrapping job I did? The nerve!
What? YOU opened the package? But why would you do something like that? I made it look pretty especially for ! The wrapping paper was the most important part.
tried it on right in front of you? <10_4 />Well, must have been really excited. Perfect!
Ah, is that so? It sounds like they liked it. I'm so very happy, !
Hmm, so didn't try it on or anything?<10_4 /> Well, you can't MAKE someone have good taste
, I thought it would be perfectWell, I suppose "trying before buying" is how some folks operate.I prefer "buying, trying, returning, and buying again," but to each their own.
Ah, I knew she'd like it. Score another perfect gift for ! And thank you for the report, .
Well, I'm glad to hear she liked it. She can be a bit tricky to shop for, you know. Thanks for letting me know, .
Oh, did she actually admit to liking it? I've been trying to impress her for years, ! Thanks for giving me the scoop, .
Oh, that's good to hear. Sometimes I have no idea what sort of things she likes at all. Thanks for the report, !
Well, he's not a hard one to please, is he? But I'm glad to hear that it lived up to his "standards." Thanks for filling me in, .
Oh, he actually liked it? He's an odd one—I don't know what he's talking about more than half the time. Well, I'm glad to hear it was a hit. Thank you for the information, .
Well, it seems even our local curmudgeon can be charmed. I'm glad to hear he liked it! Thank you for the update.
Ahh, I'm so relieved to hear he liked it. He's something of a tastemaker, you know. Well, thank you for the heads-up.
Ah! ! You did as I asked and gave the present to , right?
Well? How did it go? What did say? Is still angry with me?
Here's the story...
I don't remember.
Oh, I almost don't want to hear the answer, but was still mad at me?
So, actually...
I don't remember.
What?! The reaction was the most important part. It was the WHOLE POINT, ! Ughnow what? How will I know if still mad at me? I suppose I'll never find out
I cannot believe what I'm hearing. You OPENED it?!You took my olive branch of a gift for and just tore into it? Shame on you!
You justopened it? I spent all that time wrapping it, and you justopened it! I'm trying to make up with a friend here. I do NOT have time to deal with thisthisgift gaffe!
So isn't angry with me anymore?<10_4 /> That's such a relief.Thanks for helping me extend that olive branch, so to speak. I think everything is going to be OK.
So, about that item that I borrowed from You didn't return it yet, did you? I've been thinking it might be better for me to do it in person.
Remember the item that I gave you to return to ?Well, if you haven't already, I think I'll deliver it myself after all. Just hand it on back to me, OK?
You still have the package that I asked you to deliver to , don't you? Well, if you don't mind, I think I'll just deliver it myself now. I know getting a bit anxious for it.
Darling, you do remember that I asked you to return something to , don't you? Well, I only ask because you haven't done it and I'm getting impatient. I'll be taking over now, thank you!

Say, about that little item that I asked you to deliver to my friend
I'll be taking it back now. I'm sorry, but I need to deliver it immediately.I'm just getting a bit worried that and I will never make up
If you were too busy, you should have said so in the first place!I'm sorry, perhaps I'm being unreasonable,
Did it simply slip your mind?I'm sorry. I should have let you know how important it was to me.
Don't quit your day job—unless your day job involves delivering important packages! I'm sorry, that was a bit rude. I'll go deliver it myself, and then I'll feel better, I'm sure.
I appreciate you trying to help, but you're obviously too busy for this sort of thing. Next time, try under promising and over delivering, !
Did you try to deliver the package, only to find too furious to accept it? Well, I suppose I should take care of this myself, seeing as I started the whole thing in the first place

Wait, what's this? Did you just unwrap it and give it back to me?Why would you do that?! The nice wrapping was at least half of the gift, ! Well, I suppose I'll rewrap it and take care of the delivery myself. If you want something done right

OK, so here's the itembut what happened to the wrapping? Did you open this?! Alright. I suppose I should have just taken care of this myself if I wanted it done right. I'll take it from here. Let this be a lesson not to open other people's packages, !

Yes, this is the itembut why is it unwrapped? Did you open it for some reason? The package was clearly addressed to ! What were you thinking?! Fine, yes, whatever. I'll just wrap it again and deliver it myself. I have NOTHING better to do.
Wait, but why is this open?<10_4 /> You OPENED it?!There's no charm in an unwrapped gift—I'll have to wrap it all over again, . What made you think you should open someone else's package, hmm?

OK, but what happened to the nice wrapping paper? You opened this, didn't you? How would it reflect on me for you to deliver a half-baked apology like this, hmm? You know what? It's fine. I shouldn't have asked someone else to handle this in the first place.
Oh noyou LOST it? What am I supposed to do now?I suppose this isn't your problem anymore. I never should have delegated something so important.
Oh noyou LOST it? What am I supposed to do now? That belonged to , you know! I never should have entrusted it to anyone else. Well, I'll think of something, I guess
Youyou actually LOST it? What am I supposed to do now? That was for ! I'm sorry. This is all my fault for delegating such an important task. I'll figure something out.
What do you mean you lost it? How could you do that? That gift was meant for ! I suppose I should have just given it directly to in the first place. Oh, well

What? You lost it? <10_4 />NO! And here I thought I could finally make up with Alright, . You did this to yourself. Clearly you shouldn't have delegated this. Sorry, . I'll figure something outsomehow
